name: Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey
description:
If you’re ready to soar through the air as a human cannonball, perform with magnificent Bengal tigers, defy gravity on a motorcycle in the Spherical Miracle, dazzle the crowd with aerial acrobatics, clown around in a juggling jamboree and dance with an exotic Asian elephant… then you’re ready for the fun and thrill that can only be experienced at Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey.

Features

• Compatible with the Wii Balance Board
• Competitive Multiplayer Play
